docs.snippet: Glen Taylor, owner of the Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, has signed a letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune, the newspaper announced on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glen Taylor, owner of the Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, has signed a letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune, the newspaper announced on Tuesday.
docs.abstract: Glen Taylor, billionaire owner of Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, signs letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune.

headline.main: Billionaire Sports Owner Plans to Buy Minneapolis Newspaper

docs.snippet: The stops on Bo Ryan's coaching resume sound like a road trip across southern Wisconsin, from Platteville to Milwaukee to Madison. He has been pacing sidelines for so long in this state, it's hard to imagine Ryan being anywhere but the Midwest....

docs.snippet: Turning college players into employees would only make things worse....

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Patrick T Harker, president of the University of Delaware, contends unionization of student athletes would be a disaster for universities, college sports fans and for student athletes themselves.
